metadata.Readme:
Sitecore E-Commerce QuickPay ${product.version.quickpay} ------------------------------------------------------------- Date: ${readme.date}
------------------------------------------------------------- Prerequisites:
• ${project.fullname.multiple}.
------------------------------------------------------------- Post installation steps:
• Copy the payment options that you need from "/sitecore/system/Modules/Ecommerce/Payment Options" to Webshop Business Settings/Payment Options. • Configure the payment system credentials and settings. • Publish the content • Register the payment system alias in Unity.config: <alias alias="QuickPayPaymentProvider" type="Sitecore.Ecommerce.Payments.QuickPay.QuickPayPaymentProvider, Sitecore.Ecommerce.Payments.QuickPay"/> • Register the payment system in the container section of Unity.config: <register type="PaymentProvider" mapTo="QuickPayPaymentProvider" name="QuickPay" />
By default the payment system is configured to work as reservable payment provider. Set the "autocapture" setting to "1" to make the one work without ticket reservation: <setting id="autocapture">1</setting>
For more information about payment options, see the Payment Method Reference Guide.
